home.message: Only 4 hours from the time of catch to the time of canning

section_1.message: Our company is engaged in brokerage activities in the food market, specializing mainly in seafood trading. We are ready to consider the possibility of cooperation and discuss the terms of contracts with interested parties.

section_2.message: Our main objective is to ensure effective settlement of trade relations between the parties, to reach agreements on attractive and fair prices for products and to guarantee successful realization of deliveries. We strive to create long-term and mutually beneficial partnerships based on mutual trust and transparency.

section_3.message: Our core business is the organization and implementation of long-term supply contracts with our major partners. In addition, we take care of the logistical aspects of supplying products to our customers in accordance with the agreements. Our experience and professionalism allow us to effectively coordinate all stages of the process: from contract negotiation to successful delivery of goods. We strive for a high level of service and satisfaction of our customers, maintaining stable and trusting relationships in the market.

section_4.message: Our offer is based on the provision of high quality products, confirmed by the necessary licenses and quality certificates. We also adhere to the principles of transparency and honesty in all our business relationships with customers and partners, which is demonstrated by drawing up clear and detailed contracts. Our goal also includes working to normalize the prices of our products in the market, which contributes to the stability and confidence of our partners and customers in transactions with us. We are convinced that honesty, quality and honoring commitments are the basis for long-term and successful business relationships.

section_5.message: According to expert estimates and our own forecasts, the volume of the food market in the Russian Federation is expected to exceed the mark of 21 trillion Russian rubles, equivalent to 230 billion dollars, by 2024. In parallel, it is worth noting that the volume of food trade relations between the Republic of Belarus and the Russian Federation amounts to 26.1 billion dollars or approximately 2.4 trillion Russian rubles.

4c31cac1-a7c2-4ef9-9b80-e3a0470fc9da.name: Kamchatka Pink salmon fresh-frozen, supplements free
4c31cac1-a7c2-4ef9-9b80-e3a0470fc9da.composition: Caviar (grain) of Far Eastern salmon fish, table salt, food glycerin, refined sunflower oil.
4c31cac1-a7c2-4ef9-9b80-e3a0470fc9da.description: Kamchatka Pink salmon - is the most common member of the salmon family, which is why its caviar is the most popular and familiar to most people. It has a truly classic flavor, with a slight tinge of bitterness.
4c31cac1-a7c2-4ef9-9b80-e3a0470fc9da.recommendation: It is recommended to defrost the caviar at 4°C to 15°C before consumption.
4c31cac1-a7c2-4ef9-9b80-e3a0470fc9da.shelf_life: After opening the package it is possible to store the product for a short period of time (not more than 36 hours) at temperatures from 0 to 6°C in a domestic refrigerator. Store at a temperature not exceeding minus 18°C. Packed under vacuum.
4c31cac1-a7c2-4ef9-9b80-e3a0470fc9da.expiration_date: 12 months from the date of manufacture.

d2cca71a-8d36-4249-a5ff-15bed79e7bd8.name: Kamchatka Chum salmon fresh-frozen, supplements free
d2cca71a-8d36-4249-a5ff-15bed79e7bd8.composition: Caviar (grain) of Far Eastern salmon fish, table salt, food glycerin, refined sunflower oil.
d2cca71a-8d36-4249-a5ff-15bed79e7bd8.description: Настоящий деликатес, который высоко ценится среди других видов, по размеру уступает только икре чавычи, занесенной в Красную книгу. Не даром икру кеты называют царской, за ее янтарный блеск, крупные зерна и нежный сливочный вкус.
d2cca71a-8d36-4249-a5ff-15bed79e7bd8.recommendation: It is recommended to defrost the caviar at 4°C to 15°C before consumption.
d2cca71a-8d36-4249-a5ff-15bed79e7bd8.shelf_life: After opening the package it is possible to store the product for a short period of time (not more than 36 hours) at temperatures from 0 to 6°C in a domestic refrigerator. Store at a temperature not exceeding minus 18°C. Packed under vacuum.
d2cca71a-8d36-4249-a5ff-15bed79e7bd8.expiration_date: 12 months from the date of manufacture.

216e5ad3-a6a9-41df-9017-febf50b68f8a.name: Kamchatka Sockeye salmon fresh-frozen, supplements free
216e5ad3-a6a9-41df-9017-febf50b68f8a.composition: Caviar (grain) of Far Eastern salmon fish, table salt, food glycerin, refined sunflower oil.
216e5ad3-a6a9-41df-9017-febf50b68f8a.description: Икра нерки является самой дефицитной из всех видов, обладает насыщенными вкусовыми красками, с выраженным оттенком горечи, тем не менее она так нежна, что в буквальном смысле слова, тает во рту.
216e5ad3-a6a9-41df-9017-febf50b68f8a.recommendation: It is recommended to defrost the caviar at 4°C to 15°C before consumption.
216e5ad3-a6a9-41df-9017-febf50b68f8a.shelf_life: After opening the package it is possible to store the product for a short period of time (not more than 36 hours) at temperatures from 0 to 6°C in a domestic refrigerator. Store at a temperature not exceeding minus 18°C. Packed under vacuum.
216e5ad3-a6a9-41df-9017-febf50b68f8a.expiration_date: 12 months from the date of manufacture.
